About Us Contact Us Sign up
Neighbourgoods news..
EVERY SATURDAY RAIN OR SHINE 09:00 - 15:00 \n\n
The Neighbourgoods Market Johannesburg was founded by original members Justin Rhodes and Cameron Munro in partnership with Adam Levy of Play Braamfontein \n\n A company that has been at the forefront of turning the once dilapidated neighbourhood of Braamfontein into the pioneering creative hub that it is now. \n\n Housed in a modernist building that has a spectacular 15 story wall mural by the famed artist Eduardo Villa, the market is as much a source for farm fresh foods and specialty goods as it is a meeting point to enjoy community, swop ideas and stories, and be inspired by the energy that makes Johannesburg. \n\n BaqSpace Inc.
Vendor Information
GUJON CHICKEN: \n Chicken strips floured, egg crumbed with black and white sesame seeds then deep fried to perfection. Served with skinny fries, Asian slaw and seasonal salad. \n\n TALIAN STALLION: \n A pillow of soft bun garnished with tomato, lettuce, Asian slaw then topped with two juicy chicken fillets and our home made Napoletana sauce. Served with skinny fries (Chicken can be deep fried or grilled) \n\n BAHN MI: \n French loaf stuffed with Asian meat balls cooked in a fresh tomato sauce then topped with cucumber, coriander and pickled carrot and daikon \n\n GUA BAO BUN: \n Soft white Asian steamed bun served with a deboned chicken thigh coated in sweet chili then drizzled with a siracha sauce \n\n FISH TACOS: \n Fish tacos with cream fraiche and caviar \n\n
Reviews will go here...
info@sumtingfresh.co.za \n\n andrew@sumtingfresh.co.za \n\n hezron@sumtingfresh.co.za \n\n
Sumting Fresh \n\n Classically trained chefs, Hezron Louw and Andrew Leeuw, the business minds behind food truck company Sumting Fresh began selling at Neighbourgoods in 2014 and have since become popular amongst market goers for their restaurant style street food as well as their unique way of interacting with customers. \n\n “We entertain our customers by collectively chanting and singing while preparing the food, as well as make an effort address our customers with compliments”, mentions Hezron. Their most ordered dish are their deep fried Gujon chicken strips served with an Asian slaw summer salad and fries, topped with sweet chilli, aioli and parmesan cheese. \n\n Their other meal option on offer is equally delicious; the Italian Stallion comprises of floured egg crumb chicken, Napoletana sauce and parmesan cheese in a fresh bread roll with an Asian slaw summer side salad
